title: Enlarging the rewards for SHAKE holding from 1% to 2.5%
body:
Due to a high number of requests from the SpaceSwap community, we would like to initiate a decentralized vote with the following purpose: 

To enlarge the reward % for SHAKE holders - from 1% of all the distributed rewards for the MILK2 farming process (per 100k Ethereum blocks / 466 BSC blocks), to 2.5%.
If the community votes for these changes, we’ll implement the new interest calculations with respect to the Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain blocks.
https://etherscan.io/block/countdown/12540000  
https://bscscan.com/block/countdown/7986565


Options: 

Agree with enlarging the rewards.

Disagree with enlarging the rewards.
author: 0x72d49544D17e3C98B0f94D97eE851981279f3aa9
